events.message: We have received the application from the candidate who applied for the software engineer position.
The application has been categorized under the engineering cluster based on keywords such as software and developer.
Recruiter John Doe has been assigned to handle this candidateâ€™s software engineer application.
Completed the initial screening call where the candidate showed strong knowledge in software development principles.
The candidate responded positively and confirmed availability for the upcoming technical interview.
Scheduled the technical interview for the software developer role on May 5th, 10am UTC.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating solid skills in coding and system design.
Scheduled the HR interview for the candidate on May 7th to discuss company culture and benefits.
The HR interview was completed successfully, with the candidate expressing enthusiasm about joining the team.
An offer for the software developer position was proposed, outlining salary, benefits, and start date.
The candidate shared positive feedback on the offer and confirmed understanding of all terms mentioned.
The candidate officially accepted the offer and expressed excitement to begin the new role.
Onboarding process started for the new software engineer, including equipment setup and introductory meetings.
The hiring process was successfully closed with the candidate fully onboarded and integrated into the engineering team.
